title: Octagonal Sans-Serif
content:
I'm trying to figure out what the font used for 'César Troisgros'. Seems like an octagonal version of Alternate Gothic No. 2 or something similar.

Font: 

 Hold Fast Foundry Prohibition 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052142/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [la-vittoria-2013-14.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052142/http:/typophile.com/files/la-vittoria-2013-14.jpg) | 117.6 KB |
author: tylor.reimer

comments.content:
Hold Fast Foundry [Prohibition](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition) using some stylistic alternates such as / [A](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/590413/60), / [I](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/590413/69), / [Q](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/590413/74), / [R](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/590413/75), / [S](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/590413/76)...  
Alternative: [Mr Robot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hipopotam/mr-robot)
